DOC.brief_summary: for evaluating inverse ratio ventilation of laparoscopic bariatric surgery
DOC.brief_title: Inverse Ratio Ventilation on Bariatric Operation
DOC.detailed_description: inverse ratio ventilation had been improve the oxygenation and respiratory mechanics during care of ARDS patients or during general anesthesia. We hypothized inverse ratio ventilatio could improve the oxygenation and respiratory mechanics on the obese patient also.
DOC.criteria: ASA PS 12 obese patients(BMI>30) underlying cardiopulmonary diasease
